channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan on High Alert for Post-Inauguration Chinese Drills
item.description: Security officials say Taiwan should be on alert for Chinese military activity in the weeks after President-elect Lai Ching-te takes office in late May.

item.title: Solomon Islands Selects Former Foreign Minister as New Leader
item.description: The Solomon Islands' parliament has elected former foreign minister Jeremiah Manele as the Pacific island nation's new leader. Manele, who comes from the same party as the previous

item.title: U.K. National Gallery Exhibition Opens at Chimei Museum
item.description: The “Masterpieces From the National Gallery” exhibition has kicked off at Chimei Museum in Tainan, fearuring over 50 works from renowned artists from the U.K. National Gallery.

item.title: Taiwan Issues Travel Warnings as China Enacts Expanded Security Law
item.description: Officials in Taiwan are warning citizens about an expanded security law in China. The law cracks down on internet security in China and could raise concerns for Taiwanese businesse
